input.sentences: [female] posing in front of one of the pyramids .
some huge pyramids off in the distance .
our camel train that took us to the pyramids .
this was dinky | our personal camel .
the face on this one was worn away over time .
output.sentences: Gerda had always wanted to go see the pyramids and was so excited when she finally did that she almost couldn't speak.
The gorgeous and awe-inspiring peaks were sharp and daunting in the early light, but almost mystical in the later afternoon, when the sunlight grew hazy.
In order to get to them Gerda and her party of fellow travelers had to go by camel back.
It was a long trip and a long entourage, sometimes the camels and the travelers had to stop.
The famous and noseless pyramid was something to see all right.
